description:
### 11.141 lagfun

Slowly update darker pixels.

This filter makes short flashes of light appear longer. This filter accepts
the following options:

**decay**

    Set factor for decaying. Default is .95. Allowed range is from 0 to 1. 

**planes**

    Set which planes to filter. Default is all. Allowed range is from 0 to 15.
name: lagfun

options.description: Set factor for decaying. Default is .95. Allowed range is from 0 to 1.
options.name: decay

options.description: Set which planes to filter. Default is all. Allowed range is from 0 to 15.
options.name: planes
